# Jian Zou
### Student of Biostatistics
<br>
I am completing a doctoral degree of Biostatistics at [School of Public Health](https://www.publichealth.pitt.edu/), University of Pittsburgh supervised by [Dr. George C. Tseng](http://www.pitt.edu/~ctseng/). I am also a graduate student researcher under the guidance of [Dr. Steffi Oesterreich](https://www.pharmacology.us/Faculty/SteffiOesterreich) and [Dr. Adrian Lee](https://www.pharmacology.us/Faculty/AdrianLee) at UPMC Magee-Women's Research Institute. 

I was awarded M.S. of Biostatistics at [Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/), Columbia University and two B.S. degrees (Biotechnology and Applied Chemistry) at [School of Life Science](http://bio.ccnu.edu.cn/), Central China Normal University.
